quote.fourth: When I first arrived on earth, I never thought I'd find a place to use my qualta blade, however with the help of Citysport I was able to find a fencing school where I can hone my skills and teach others part of a fine Luxan tradition.
quote.second: Finding inner peace through meditation is troublesome at the best of times. Thank the goddess for citysport's extensive reposistory of yoga and meditation studios.
quote.third: Thanks to Citysport I was able to find a good boxing gym to work out. Now I woun't have to kill my husband.
quote.first: I needed a place to practice firing my REALLY big guns. Citysport had the knowledge I'd been seeking
